title: Dream11 SDE-1
content:
Education: Bachelors from a **Tier-1** College
Years of Experience: 0
Date of the Offer: August
Company: Dream11
Title/Level: **SDE 1**
Location: Mumbai, India
Base Salary: **20 LPA**
Relocation: 2-3 weeks stay + flight tickets + packers and movers (will be reimbursed)
Joining Bonus: 2L INR (with **2 years of clawback period**)
Stock bonus: 12L INR (**10%, 20%, 30%, 40%** respectively vested over 4 years)
No performance bonus
Proximity Allowance: **Minimum** of (50% of rent **OR** 35k) per month given you **stay within 60 minutes** from the office
**CTC (1st year) - 23.2 LPA** (actual number is somewhat higher as the company doesn't include costs for relocation, retreat for new joiners, etc in CTC)
Benefits: Unlimited leaves, International Trip, Gym, Insurance and other wellness benefits

title: Evaluate Offer | Oracle OCI | PMTS  | Bangalore
content:
Got confimration from Oracle OCI for below details:

Education: Btech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 11
Prior Experience: Product Based organization
Company: Oracle OCI
Title/Level: PMTS
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: 65 Lakh INR (inl PF from both sides)
Stock: $190K stocks vested over 4 years
Signing Bonus: 0 (Was told OCI has stopped joining bonus)
Total comp (Salary  + Stock): ~105L
Benefits: Standard Oracle
Current CTC: 70 lpa
salary: 65 Lakh Inr (inl Pf From Both Sides)

title: Cars24 | SDE-II | Gurugram
content:
College: Tier 1
Education: B.Tech (CSE)
Years of experience: 2.4 years
Prev Company: SDE at startup
Prev Comp: 20.5 base + 2 Bonus + ESOPs

Company: Cars24
Title/Level: SDE-II
Location: Gurugram
Salary: 32.5L
Stock bonus: 5L ESOPs over 4 years
Bonus: 1.5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 32.5 + 1.5 + 1.25 = 35.25L

title: Rippling | SDE-2 (L6) | Bangalore
content:
Education: Not IITs, but good govt college
Years of Experience: 3
Date of the Offer: Sept, 2024
Company: Rippling
Title/Level: SDE - 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 50  lakhs
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1.25 (need gst bills)
Stock bonus: ~4.5 lakhs/year
Variable Bonus: 7.5 lakhs
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~61 Lakhs/year
